casebody.data:
Thursday, December 19, 1991

MOTION DOCKET

91-1351. State v. Schaim.

Hamilton County, No. C-900011. This cause is pending before the court as an appeal and cross-appeal from the Court of Appeals for Hamilton County. Upon consideration of appellant/cross-appellee’s motion for removal of bond restrictions,

IT IS ORDERED by the court that said motion for removal of bond restrictions be, and hereby is, denied, effective December 18, 1991.
